metadata.title: CVE-2023-3417 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Thunderbird allowed the Text Direction Override Unicode Character infilenames. An email attachment could be incorrectly shown as being adocument file, while in fact it was an executable file. Newer versions ofThunderbird will strip the character and show the correct file extension.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 115.0.1 and Thunderbird <102.13.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
